EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-06-07-Product-Release-6-1-EMEA.ES-2018-06-06-Product-Release-6-1-Email-
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register | Using AI to Maximize Cloud Cost Savings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-cut-cloud-costs/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
This is your last chance! Don't miss our live webinar on Thursday, June 7 at 2pm GMT. Join Mor Cohen-Tal, our Cloud CTO, as she discusses Using AI to Continuously Maximize Cloud Cost Savings. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-cut-cloud-costs/]]>
During the webinar, you will learn how to continuously optimize reserved instance utilization in concert with resizing automation – to drive the elasticity AND cost savings you want and expect from the cloud.
Regards, Graeme
PS - If you can't join the live webinar, feel free to sign up anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-cut-cloud-costs/]]>, and we'll email you the recording afterwards.
